creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
For the record:

mod_mbox does not display mails that have no Message-Id.
They are stored in the mbox file, but not visible in the GUI.
This is presumably because the Message-Id is needed to create the Permalink.

creator: jim@apache.org
text:
According to RFC 2822, Message-ID is a SHOULD field.

I cannot think of any Email server/client/setup which does not do weird things if the header doesn't exist.
